content.description: Short bolted crack on very clean rock with a slab crux up high.  Best warm up so far at the crag.
Climb to black-streaked (Raya Negra) overhanging dihedral.  Crux at top of this corner.
content.location: Just to right of Gorge Us

content.description: start under roof in corner and turn roof on left after stick clipping first bolt. balance right to second  bolt and figure out the flakes leading to a left leaning crack. Go up "rat run" splitter for 30ft. to roof with anchors on the left.
content.protection: four bolts to a .75 inch crack requiring about four pieces to chains
content.location: 100' right of afterburner in black rock. low point of buttress.

climbs.name: Out Rage Us (Var.)
climbs.fa: Mike Howard,  Joel Tinl & Jay Foley

content.description: By combining the 4 lower bolts of Raya Negra and traversing to the upper arete of Gorge Us you get an Out Rage Us sustained 10+
content.protection: 10 bolts to Sport anchor with SS Biners
content.location: Start at Raya Negra corner and traverse left into the upper arete of Gorge Us.

content.description: Thin hands and off sized fingers.
content.protection: Gray to red camalots.   Rap from the anchor on "Get Fatty".

content.description: Climb the same crack start as for Gavilan but continue straight into the steep Inside corner (clip a long runner on the 2nd bolt of Gavilan).  Crux involves technical stemming up under the roof.  Turn the roof and clip 2 more bolts to then join the upper crux of Gavilan.
content.location: Start in off-hand crack as for Gavilan.  Due to sharp roof edge, it is  best to have 2nd follow and clean the route or recommend rappelling to minimize rope wear over edge. Enjoy.

content.description: Direct bouldery start with stick clip on first bolt. Continue to narrow arete with continuous pockets and excelent climbing to two bolt anchor.
Immediately left of "Gorge Us".  Start in  flared crack past 4 bolts to ledge.  Crux climbing in thin corner above to pumpy roof.
content.protection: 12 quickdraws to chain anchor.  Please leave biners in place

content.description: The crux is getting past the first three bolts up the blunt arete. Thin moves on somewhat sharp edges. After the arete follow Galivan to the anchors.
content.location: Start in a short corner that leads to a blunt arete.

content.description: Great rock and cool moves. Good warm-up
content.location: Start 15 feet right of Galivan at a short thin corner with bolts.

content.description: Crux is up high in the right-leaning corner. Caution for loose rock.
content.location: One of the best warm-ups on the wall. Start 50 feet right of the Afterburner Wall at a short corner with a hand crack.

content.description: A concentration of steep dihedrals and aretes in succession. A mad rush to place dynabolt golds ensued. See Vista Verde for location. This cluster of climbs is downstream from Home by 5 and upstream of the Afterburner face.
